segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a senior mendicant with five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.

segments.pli: Avītarāgo hoti, avītadoso hoti, avītamoho hoti, makkhī ca, paḷāsī ca—
segments.en: They’re not free of greed, hate, and delusion; they are offensive and contemptuous.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
segments.en: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
segments.en: A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.

segments.pli: Vītarāgo hoti, vītadoso hoti, vītamoho hoti, amakkhī ca, apaḷāsī ca—
segments.en: They’re free of greed, hate, and delusion; they’re not offensive and contemptuous.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
segments.en: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, a senior mendicant with five qualities is unlikable…

suttaplex.blurb: Senior mendicants with strong defilements are disliked.
